trans-unit.source: Handle to parent or owner window

seg-source.mrk: Handle to parent or owner window

target.mrk: Handle to parent or owner window

trans-unit.source: Text to be displayed in the control

seg-source.mrk: Text to be displayed in the control

target.mrk: Text to be displayed in the control

trans-unit.source: $ES_AUTOHSCROLL - Automatically scrolls text to the right by 10 characters when the user types a character at the end of the line.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_AUTOHSCROLL - Automatically scrolls text to the right by 10 characters when the user types a character at the end of the line.

target.mrk: $ES_AUTOHSCROLL - Automatically scrolls text to the right by 10 characters when the user types a character at the end of the line.

trans-unit.source: $ES_AUTOVSCROLL - Automatically scrolls text up one page when the user presses the ENTER key on the last line.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_AUTOVSCROLL - Automatically scrolls text up one page when the user presses the ENTER key on the last line.

target.mrk: $ES_AUTOVSCROLL - Automatically scrolls text up one page when the user presses the ENTER key on the last line.

trans-unit.source: $ES_CENTER - Centers text in an edit control.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_CENTER - Centers text in an edit control.

target.mrk: $ES_CENTER - Centers text in an edit control.

trans-unit.source: $ES_LEFT - Aligns text with the left margin.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_LEFT - Aligns text with the left margin.

target.mrk: $ES_LEFT - Aligns text with the left margin.

trans-unit.source: $ES_LOWERCASE - Converts all characters to lowercase as they are typed into the edit control.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_LOWERCASE - Converts all characters to lowercase as they are typed into the edit control.

target.mrk: $ES_LOWERCASE - Converts all characters to lowercase as they are typed into the edit control.

trans-unit.source: $ES_NOHIDESEL - The selected text is inverted, even if the control does not have the focus.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_NOHIDESEL - The selected text is inverted, even if the control does not have the focus.

target.mrk: $ES_NOHIDESEL - The selected text is inverted, even if the control does not have the focus.

trans-unit.source: $ES_NUMBER - Allows only digits to be entered into the edit control.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_NUMBER - Allows only digits to be entered into the edit control.

target.mrk: $ES_NUMBER - Allows only digits to be entered into the edit control.

trans-unit.source: $ES_OEMCONVERT - Converts text entered in the edit control.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_OEMCONVERT - Converts text entered in the edit control.

target.mrk: $ES_OEMCONVERT - Converts text entered in the edit control.

trans-unit.source: $ES_READONLY - Prevents the user from typing or editing text in the edit control.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_READONLY - Prevents the user from typing or editing text in the edit control.

target.mrk: $ES_READONLY - Prevents the user from typing or editing text in the edit control.

trans-unit.source: $ES_UPPERCASE - Converts all characters to uppercase as they are typed into the edit control.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_UPPERCASE - Converts all characters to uppercase as they are typed into the edit control.

target.mrk: $ES_UPPERCASE - Converts all characters to uppercase as they are typed into the edit control.

trans-unit.source: $ES_WANTRETURN - Specifies that a carriage return be inserted when the user presses the ENTER key.

seg-source.mrk: $ES_WANTRETURN - Specifies that a carriage return be inserted when the user presses the ENTER key.

target.mrk: $ES_WANTRETURN - Specifies that a carriage return be inserted when the user presses the ENTER key.

trans-unit.source: $ES_PASSWORD - Displays an asterisk (*) for each character that is typed into the edit control

seg-source.mrk: $ES_PASSWORD - Displays an asterisk (*) for each character that is typed into the edit control

target.mrk: $ES_PASSWORD - Displays an asterisk (*) for each character that is typed into the edit control

trans-unit.source: Forced : WS_CHILD, $WS_VISIBLE, $WS_TABSTOP only if not using $ES_READONLY
[optional] Control extended style. These correspond to the standard $WS_EX_* constants. See Extended Style Table.

seg-source.mrk: These correspond to the standard $WS_EX_* constants.

target.mrk: These correspond to the standard $WS_EX_* constants.

trans-unit.source: the handle to the Edit control.

seg-source.mrk: the handle to the Edit control.

target.mrk: the handle to the Edit control.

trans-unit.source: This function is for Advanced users and for learning how the control works.

target.mrk: This function is for Advanced users and for learning how the control works.
